input_data.title: Big Sky
input_data.overview: Private detective Cassie Dewell partners with ex-cop Jenny Hoyt on a search for two sisters who have been kidnapped by a truck driver on a remote highway in Montana. When they discover that these are not the only girls who have disappeared in the area, they must race against the clock to stop the perpetrator before another woman is taken.

response.analytical_summary: Big Sky is a crime drama series centered on the investigation of kidnappings and murders in the expansive landscapes of Montana. The show blends elements of procedural crime solving with a serialized narrative, exploring the complex relationships between law enforcement and the dangerous individuals they pursue. It features a dual protagonist structure, with a private detective and an ex-cop forming an uneasy alliance. The series maintains a suspenseful tone, driven by the vastness of the setting and the unpredictable nature of the crimes, and delves into themes of family, justice, and the dark underbelly of seemingly idyllic communities.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with the disappearance of two sisters, triggering an investigation led by private detective Cassie Dewell and ex-cop Jenny Hoyt. Their initial focus on the truck driver, presumed to be the kidnapper, quickly expands as they uncover a pattern of missing women linked to a larger, more sinister organization. The first season reveals a complex network of criminals operating under the guise of a seemingly ordinary family, culminating in a confrontation that exposes deep-seated secrets and betrayals. Subsequent seasons introduce new cases and antagonists, often connected to the overarching narrative of the initial kidnappings. Characters grapple with personal demons and professional challenges, forging unexpected alliances and enduring devastating losses as they confront increasingly dangerous adversaries. The series explores the cyclical nature of violence and the enduring impact of trauma on both victims and those sworn to protect them, with the overarching mystery slowly unraveling to reveal a web of interconnected crimes spanning years.
response.keyword_sentence: Set against the vast landscapes of Montana, Big Sky is a suspenseful crime drama that explores themes of justice, family secrets, and the dark underbelly of rural America through the intertwined stories of a private detective and an ex-cop.
